text: Estilo y PersonalidadInformation on Estilo y Personalidad is a compilation album by Puerto Rican singer Yolandita Monge. It was released in 1979 and includes hits from her early six studio albums before she signed with the New York based recording label Coco Records. The album was re-released in the early 1990s by the label Disco Hit in CD and Cassette format. It is currently out of print in all media layouts. ==Track listing== {| class="wikitable" |- style="background:#ccc; text-align:center;" !Track !Title !Composer(s) !Taken From The Album |- |1 |"Vida" |Tite Curet Alonso |Puerto Rico's Poignant...
